Key Control
Are core values are communicated from executive management to personnel through policies and the employee handbook?
items.value: Yes, core values are communicated through our employee handbook, onboarding sessions, and quarterly town hall meetings.

items.question: Is management's organizational structure with relevant reporting lines documented in an organization chart ?
items.value: Yes, the organizational structure is documented and available in our internal HR portal.

items.question: Can management provide a sample of (5) company job descriptions?
items.codingInstructions: Roles and Responsibilities including CISO, CFO, Data Privacy and other roles
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Roles and Responsibilities including CISO, CFO, Data Privacy and other roles
items.value: Yes, we have attached job descriptions for the following roles: Compliance Officer, Security Analyst, IT Administrator, HR Manager, and Product Manager.

items.question: Is there an employee handbook in place, and does it include the organization's entity values and behavioral standards? If yes, how is it made available for all employees?
items.value: Yes, the employee handbook includes our values and behavioral standards. It is available on our internal employee portal and provided during onboarding.

items.question: Has management documented formal HR procedures that include the employee on-boarding process?
items.value: Yes, formal HR procedures outline the entire onboarding process, from background checks to system access provisioning.

items.question: Are new hire checklists utilized, and activities documented to help facilitate new hire procedures?
items.codingInstructions: Hiring checklist for a sample of employees
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Hiring checklist for a sample of employees
items.value: Yes, new hire checklists are used to track all onboarding activities, including compliance training and system access provisioning.

items.question: How are candidates recruited for job openings? Evidence could include the recruitment policies and procedures; a PowerPoint deck, a questionnaire, job opening postings, or emails.
items.codingInstructions: Evidence that a third party (if a third party is used for recruiting)
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Evidence that a third party (if a third party is used for recruiting)
items.value: Candidates are recruited through our internal referral program, job postings on LinkedIn and our careers page, and partnerships with recruitment agencies.

items.question: Are there any requirements for Continued Professional Education Training among employees?
items.codingInstructions: Evidence that Continued Professional Education Training is tracked and monitored for employees (e.g. tracking tool / spreadsheet)
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Evidence that Continued Professional Education Training is tracked and monitored for employees (e.g. tracking tool / spreadsheet)
items.value: Yes, employees in security and compliance roles must complete annual training programs, including SOC 2 awareness and cybersecurity best practices.

items.question: Is there a mentor program to develop personnel in place?
items.codingInstructions: Evidence could include a links to the mentor program guide; a PowerPoint deck; emails
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Evidence could include a links to the mentor program guide; a PowerPoint deck; emails
items.value: Yes, we have a mentorship program where senior employees guide and support new hires in their professional growth.

items.question: Has management documented formal HR procedures that include employee terminations?
items.value: Yes, termination procedures are documented, including exit interviews and revocation of system access.

items.question: Are termination checklists utilized, and activities documented to facilitate termination procedures?
items.codingInstructions: Termination checklist for a sample of employees
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Termination checklist for a sample of employees
items.value: Yes, a termination checklist is followed to ensure all necessary actions, such as returning company assets and disabling system access, are completed.

items.value: Yes, attached is a list of our executive team, including the CEO, CFO, CTO, and Compliance Director.

items.question: Are formal performance evaluations completed and documented? If yes, on what frequency and does this apply to all personnel? This includes executive management members such as CIO, CTO, CEO.
items.codingInstructions: Evidence could include performance evaluation forms, tracking tool/spreadsheet, or certificates
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Evidence could include performance evaluation forms, tracking tool/spreadsheet, or certificates
items.value: Yes, all employees, including executive management, receive annual performance evaluations documented in our HR system.

items.question: Do employees complete periodic information security training?
items.codingInstructions: Link to the employee training documentation
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Link to the employee training documentation
items.value: Yes, all employees complete mandatory security awareness training every six months.

items.question: Are employees cross-trained in roles and responsibilities? Evidence could include training materials; policies and procedures relating to training requirements; PowerPoint deck
items.codingInstructions: Link to the evidence of cross-training employees documentation
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Link to the evidence of cross-training employees documentation
items.value: Yes, cross-training is encouraged, especially within IT and security teams, to ensure business continuity.

items.question: Is there an employee hotline in place?
items.codingInstructions: Evidence of anonymous hotline in place (whistleblower line)
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Evidence of anonymous hotline in place (whistleblower line)

items.question: Are employees, third-parties, and customers directed on how to report unethical behaviour in a confidential manner?

items.value: Yes, we provide reporting mechanisms through our employee handbook, company website, and internal compliance training sessions.

items.question: Does management maintain an Internal Controls Matrix that includes a list of implemented controls within the environment and technology infrastructure, ownership and operation of each control, control type (manual, automated, preventive, detective, corrective), frequency of operation (daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly, multiple times a day), and documentation of the relationship between business processes, relevant technologies, and controls securing those processes?
items.codingInstructions: Link to the Internal Controls Matrix
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Link to the Internal Controls Matrix
items.value: Yes, we maintain an Internal Controls Matrix that outlines all implemented controls, their ownership, frequency of operation, and relationship to business processes.

items.question: Does management meet on a regular basis to discuss organizational goals and objectives? (This could be operations management, IT management, executive management, or a combination of these.)
items.codingInstructions: Example operational reports that show the operational/system performance and internal controls effectiveness
